label: Computer Repair and Data Recovery
description: Services related to repairing and recovering data from computers and other devices.

subcategories.label: Data Recovery
subcategories.description: Recovering lost or corrupted data from computers and other devices.

subcategories.label: Computer Repair
subcategories.description: Repairing hardware and software issues on computers and laptops.

subcategories.label: Mobile Device Repair
subcategories.description: Repairing hardware and software issues on mobile devices.

subcategories.label: Backup and Recovery
subcategories.description: Backing up and recovering data from computers and other devices.
